entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
